item.description:
There is a parking lot directly across the street from the restaurant for Royal palace customers. *If there is an attendant at the booth, just let him know you are going to the Royal Palace for dinner.

I realize this meetup falls on a weekday night, but that is when the Chinese New Year falls this year. With dinner at 6:30, you can still get home early enough to relax :) It is also a good way to greet Friday..the next day! :)

**There will be a $2.00 meetup fee for this event.
item.why: Feb 3 is the Chinese New Year.....lets ring in the year of the rabbit, with a wonderful chinese food dinner at the Royal Palace in New Haven. They will feature their regular menu, as well as specials just for the Chinese New Year.

group.name: The New Haven Area Dining Out Group

item.name: Let's Celebrate the Chinese New Year!!
